This annoying person is coming onto my server and botting ess, flax etc i really need to stop him, i got his client, and was able to decompile to find this ^. Assigning a uid wont work because he can just decompile my client and find the uid.. any idea's boys

item.title: Deltascape source cheat client help please
item.dc:creator: @jamespk jamespk
item.description:
@jamespk wrote:

if he aint a good player jail him if he makes a new account ban it if it makes a new acount ban his ip if he changes ip change yours put it under a new ip i guess lol if he follows then ddos the cunt. always works for me.
